item.title: My Quil Setup
item.description: Quil is a very simple Processing wrapper for Clojure. The writeup below is mostly code-snippets and my personal workflow. I usually work on animations and bigger projects where I like to embed sketches that act as a renderer. I don’t usually focus on real-time animations, instead saving each render to a file and then stitching it together into a video using FFmpeg. Or just selecting some of my favorite stills and publishing those.
